d: Mother curses her unborn child.

d: Devil is to have last one who leaves "black school".

d: Child unwittingly promised: "What you wife has under her belt."

a: The child born while the father is away is named Nix-Naught-Nothing.

d: Child unwittingly promised: what is born on your farm.
a: Two women agree that what is born on the farm of each belongs exclusively to the owner. The child of one is born on the farm of the other.

d: Daughter unwittingly promised to dog rescuer.

d: Child born with caul exposed.

d: Disobedient child burned.

Child exposed so as to avoid death decree.

d: Bird carries food from deserted child to starving parents.

d: Maltreated children transformed.

Ogress-wife orders raja to turn out his six wives.

Woman abandoned when with child.
